long_description: The versatile Marmot Riley Skirt is so stretchy and travel-worthy you'll wear it hiking up Italian hill towns, over bike shorts as you pedal Napa Valley vineyards, and at dinner afterward. Nylon/spandex stretch performance fabric is peached for softness, dries quickly and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Durable water repellent finish beads up moisture. DriClime(R) interior waistband feels soft against the skin. Secure zippered pocket; hand pockets and 2 back patch pockets. Marmot Riley Skirt is lightweight, durable and comfortable, ideal for travel and outdoor fun.
short_description: The versatile Marmot Riley Skirt is so stretchy and travel-worthy you'll wear it hiking up Italian hill towns, over bike shorts as you pedal Napa Valley vineyards, and at dinner afterward.
